thread.title: Spoon Share New Song “Can I Sit Next to You”: Listen | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Spoon Share New Song “Can I Sit Next to You”: Listen | Pitchfork

title: Spoon Share New Song “Can I Sit Next to You”: Listen | Pitchfork
text:
Spoon Share New Song “Can I Sit Next to You”: Listen From Hot Thoughts , out March 17 Spoon Photo by Josh Brasted/WireImage 
Spoon have shared a new song from their upcoming album Hot Thoughts . Listen to “Can I Sit Next to You” below. It follows the first single, “ Hot Thoughts .” Earlier today, the band announced new tour dates in the United States and Europe. They also recently rolled out an “ Aura Reader ” in collaboration with Spotify, which allows fans to generate custom artwork based on their favorite Spoon songs. Hot Thoughts arrives March 17 via Matador. 
Revisit our interview with Britt Daniel, “ Accidents Happen .” Artists In This Story
